attributes.action: Licence the use and sale of fireworks and ban any that aren’t silent ‘low noise’
attributes.additional_details:
.Make sellers of fireworks and buyers be tracked for sales and use.Tracking sellers and buyers via name,age,location,intended use etc (verified via id provided and signature)will help locate any misuse of fireworks to wildlife,people, property and lead to prosecution.
. Reducing the sales to public will increase public display attendance and the harm that fireworks can bring in general.
 .Set time frames of when they can go off to reduce the distress fireworks can cause for prolonged periods
attributes.background: .Ban the sale and use of general sale fireworks that aren't low noise.It’s beneficial for those with PTSD and animals that are scared of them,it reduces the harm that fireworks can cause to people and animals through the loud noise.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call similar actions: 

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
